3: Are the leaves we've gathered here enough, Watanabe-San?
That's enough. Thanks are in order, whichever way you slice it.
Leaves gathered, Watanabe and the group prepare to return to the Forsaken HQ when a Forsaken soldier sprints hurriedly up to them.
The HQ is under attack by the Corrupted... Our comrades are currently busy relocating the supplies.
You're awfully calm for an old man whose HQ is under attack.
Scraping together a living in a place like this, us Forsaken are always ready for an attack.
It's not the first time, and it won't be the last.
Watanabe squints at the HQ, their former home, now aflame.
We Forsaken came with nothing. Because of this, we can give up almost anything.
The only thing we cannot give up is our will to live on as humans, and our comrades who share our beliefs.
